TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SerializationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 存储对对象进行序列化或反序列化所需的全部数据。

span.span: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可供具有自定义序列化行为的对象。This class is used by objects with custom serialization behavior. 上的方法或填充存储的名称、 类型和它要序列化的信息的每个段的值。The method on either or populates the store with the name, type, and value of each piece of information it wants to serialize. 在反序列化，相应的函数可以提取此信息。During deserialization, the appropriate function can extract this information. 对象添加到存储在序列化时使用方法并从提取存储在反序列化使用方法。Objects are added to the store at serialization time using the methods and extracted from the store at deserialization using the methods. 有关自定义序列化的详细信息，请参阅[自定义序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md)。For more information about customizing serialization, see [Custom Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了进行自定义序列化和反序列化的各种不同的值。The following code example demonstrates the for custom serialization and deserialization of various values. [!code-cpp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

span.span: XML and SOAP Serialization
Custom serialization

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为传递`converter`参数将数据从内部表示形式转换为窗体请求的用户。The passed as the `converter` parameter converts data from its internal representation to the form the user requested. 中的数据的内部表示形式取决于创建它的格式化程序。The internal representation of the data within the depends on the formatter that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用添加的两个值名称仅可由不同的情况下，将引发任何异常，这不是建议的做法。If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice. 但是，添加两个值完全相同的名称将导致引发。However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the to be thrown.

summary.span: 将指定的对象添加到与指定的名称关联的 存储。

span.span: Adds the specified object into the store, where it is associated with a specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的对象`value`参数将序列化为返回的类型`value`。The object contained in the `value` parameter is serialized as the type returned by `value`. 如果使用添加的两个值名称仅可由不同的情况下，将引发任何异常，这不是建议的做法。If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice. 但是，添加两个值完全相同的名称将导致引发。However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the to be thrown.

Public Property AssemblyName As String
public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AssemblyName : string with get, set

summary.span: 仅在序列化期间获取或设置要序列化的类型的程序集名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly name of the type to serialize during serialization only.

value.span: 要序列化的类型的程序集的全名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly of the type to serialize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值相同包含类型的程序集的属性。The is the same as the value returned by property of the assembly of the containing type. 这是格式化程序序列化此对象的类型信息时所使用的程序集名称。This is the assembly name that the formatter uses when serializing type information for this object. 程序集名称包含程序集、 版本、 区域性和有关对象的一些安全信息的名称。The assembly name contains the name of the assembly, version, culture, and some security information about the object. 要更改正在序列化 （例如，若要为特定类型发送代理） 的类型的用户将设置此属性的值。Users who are changing the type being serialized (for example, to send a proxy for a particular type) will set the value of this property. > [!CAUTION] > 反序列化过程中使用此属性，因为未定义此属性的值。Do not use this property during deserialization because the value of this property is undefined.

span.span: The value the property is set to is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 负责设置的之前将其传递给实例。The is responsible for setting the of the instance before passing it to . 但是，想要为其对象发送代理用户将需要更改此所表示的类型实例。However, users who want to send proxies for their objects will need to change the type represented by this instance. 使用方法等效于设置同时和。Using the method is equivalent to setting both the and the . ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]
